original_text: The servant replied, “Your brother has returned home. Your father has killed the fat young cow for him. He did this because your brother is alive and he is well.”
korean_text: 대답하되 당신의 동생이 돌아왔으매 당신의 아버지가 건강한 그를 다시 맞아들이게 됨으로 인하여 살진 송아지를 잡았나이다 하니

sentences.original_text: Your father has killed the fat young cow for him
sentences.korean_translation: 당신 아버지는 그를 위해 살진 어린 소를 잡았습니다

sentences.original_text: He did this because your brother is alive
sentences.korean_translation: 아버지는 당신 동생이 살아있기 때문에 그렇게 했습니다
